I base my pricing off of a fixed price for a 60 minute photoshoot, and adjust the price depending on how much time the photoshoot takes. You get a decent price for a decent length shoot. I discount the price more for unused time than I increase it for additional time; however if it takes longer because of difficulties on my part, I won't count that time. This way, if you only need a few shots, you won't have to pay an absurd amount for a short photoshoot. On the other hand, if you want a bunch of beautiful images, you won't have to pay much more to have a longer shoot. I accept: cash, checks, credit/debit cards, PayPal and Venmo.

For every additional 10 minutes, the cost increases by 10% of the base price, and for every 10 unused minutes, 15% of the base price will be discounted.

The price per final editied photo is $2.

My pricing is as follows:
